name: Slammin Jammin
description:
Keep your shrimp crowd happy by hitting your notes and manning the DJ Deck!

If your bar reaches zero, you lose!

Place your left hand on the turntable to your left to play a note.

Switch to the proper 'note' with the 4 buttons on the right.
Start the song by pressing the play button.
Restart the level by pressing the reset button beside the play button.

Dylan C. Monterola

Juliana Rivera

Daniel Diaz-Rivera

Marcus Loyd

Tyler Watts
